desc.en: The Game Development Department is able retrieve the Mirror, but comes face-to-face with the Maid Club's president Neru in the contraband storage room. Thanks to Yuzu's quick thinking, the group is able to trick Neru and safely return to their club room.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department is able retrieve the Mirror, but comes face-to-face with the Maid Club's president Neru in the contraband storage room. Thanks to Yuzu's quick thinking, the group is able to trick Neru and safely return to their club room.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人顺利取得<镜子>之后，却在扣押品保管所遭遇女仆部的部长尼禄。多亏柚子急中生智成功骗过尼禄，游戏开发部才得以顺利返回社团活动室。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部一行人顺利取得<镜子>之后，却在扣押品保管所遭遇女仆部的部长宁瑠。多亏柚子急中生智成功骗过宁瑠，游戏开发部才得以顺利返回社团活动室。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部一行人顺利取得<镜子>之后，却在扣押品保管所遭遇女仆部的部长妮露。多亏柚子急中生智成功骗过妮露，游戏开发部才得以顺利返回社团活动室。

desc.en: The three arrived at the Contraband Room but found Neru was back. Panicking, they made a sound and attracted Neru. Fortunately, Yuzu came to rescue just in time and deceived Neru into leaving.
desc.jp: The three arrived at the Contraband Room but found Neru was back. Panicking, they made a sound and attracted Neru. Fortunately, Yuzu came to rescue just in time and deceived Neru into leaving.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 三人成功到达了保管室，却意外发现尼禄回来了。惊慌失措的众人不小心发出了声音引起注意，幸好柚子及时到来，骗过了尼禄使其离开。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 三人成功到达了保管室，却意外发现宁瑠回来了。惊慌失措的众人不小心发出了声音引起注意，幸好柚子及时到来，骗过了宁瑠使其离开。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 三人成功到达了保管室，却意外发现妮露回来了。惊慌失措的众人不小心发出了声音引起注意，幸好柚子及时到来，骗过了妮露使其离开。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.

desc.en: Neru praised Yuzu's courage, and the three retrieved the mirror successfully. Everyone began to engage the remaining robots afterwards.
desc.jp: Neru praised Yuzu's courage, and the three retrieved the mirror successfully. Everyone began to engage the remaining robots afterwards.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄走前夸奖了柚子的胆量，三人成功取回了镜子。随后众人开始与剩下的机器人作战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 宁瑠走前夸奖了柚子的胆量，三人成功取回了镜子。随后众人开始与剩下的机器人作战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 妮露走前夸奖了柚子的胆量，三人成功取回了镜子。随后众人开始与剩下的机器人作战。

desc.en: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
